scripts.code-quality: pnpm run type-check && pnpm run lint:report && pnpm run format:check
scripts.code-quality:fast: pnpm run type-check && pnpm run lint:warn-only
scripts.fix-all: pnpm run lint:fix && pnpm run format
scripts.fix-all:fast: pnpm run lint:fix --quiet && pnpm run format --cache
scripts.build: pnpm audit --audit-level moderate && node scripts/generate-sitemap-data.js && next build && cp -r public .next/standalone/
scripts.build:production: pnpm run fix-all && pnpm run code-quality && pnpm run build
scripts.build:fast: pnpm run prebuild && pnpm run build
